dc:title: The Pope and Peace
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Explains what anarchism and pacifism mean against the backdrop of the modern state. Reaffirms the principles of subsidiarity, freedom and personal responsibility, and the membership of all in the body of Christ.
